item.title: NASA’s Deep Space Communications Demo Exceeds Project Expectations
item.description: The project has exceeded all of its technical goals after two years, setting up the foundations of high-speed communications for NASA’s future human missions to Mars.

item.title: NASA’s Tally of Planets Outside Our Solar System Reaches 6,000
item.description: The milestone highlights the accelerating rate of discoveries, just over three decades since the first exoplanets were found.

item.title: NASA-ISRO Satellite Lifts Off to Track Earth’s Changing Surfaces
item.description: The first-of-its kind satellite will provide actionable information in a range of areas, including disaster response, infrastructure monitoring, and agricultural management.

item.description: The Terran R program continues to build momentum, and September delivered meaningful progress across design, manufacturing, testing, and launch. item.title: August 2025 Company Update
item.description: Throughout August, the Terran R program continued to make measurable progress toward first launch, delivering on critical program milestones. item.title: July 2025 Company Update
item.description: As development of Terran R continues to accelerate, July marked another month of meaningful progress across design, manufacturing, testing, and launch operations. item.description: As the Terran R program continues to advance, we’re highlighting some of the latest milestones across design, build, test, and launch. item.title: Updates
item.description: Learn about Terran R’s progress towards reusability.
